pages.text: The $(thing)Beneath$() is a TFC Addon that adds support for the Nether.$(br)However, the Nether doesn't really fit the theme of TFG, so we've changed it a bunch.$(br)Instead, it's now themed around really deep caves, directly below the Overworld.

It differs from the usual Nether experience in a few ways:$(li)You enter it $(l:beneath/beneath#entering)differently$()$(li)Water doesn't instantly evaporate$(li)A bed works like normal$(li)Traveling Beneath is no faster than in the Overworld

The Beneath is balanced around mid to late $(thing)primitive age$(). It's more dangerous than the overworld, so we recommend a full set of bronze armor + a metal shield as a minimum, as well as plenty of food, water, and other tools.
In return, you can find resources like $(thing)Kaolin Clay$(), $(thing)Graphite$(), richer and more exposed ore veins, as well as other treasures.

pages.title: Entering the Beneath
pages.text: Nether portals are too magical!$(br)Instead, to travel Beneath, simply stand on overworld bedrock for a few seconds.$(br)To return, stand directly below the ceiling bedrock for a few seconds.
It's a good idea to $(thing)make a note$() of where you entered, so you can return to the same place in the overworld whenever you're ready to leave.
